title: Black Bean Dip
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin black beans', '8 tablespoons light mayonnaise', '8 tablespoons half fat soured cream', '1 green chilli, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt']
